name: Eldrador Creatures
overview: Plunge into the world of Eldrador® Creatures in this turnbased strategy game. Go into combat together with your favorite Eldrador® Creatures in the Battle for the 4 Worlds and defeat the other teams so that you can call the mighty Superweapon your own and rule over Eldrador! • 20 playable original Eldrador® Creatures, including new figures like the Rock Beast and the Shadow Panther, as well as the exclusive Eldrador® Mini Creatures • Use the special abilities of your chosen creatures to defeat your opponents in tactical combat • Battle in all 4 gameworld settings: Lava, Ice, Stone and Jungle • Dynamic worlds due to toppling elements like walls and bridges
